title: Access is denied - @RevolutionGuides
solution:
What this fixes: ‚ÄúFailed to initialize log file‚Ä¶ Access is denied‚Äù on Windows.
  1. Open File Explorer.
  2. Locate Revolution Macro.
  3. Make sure you extracted the macro (do not run it from inside the zip).
  4. If it still fails, move the macro into a normal folder (for example: Downloads or Desktop).
  5. Important: Revolution Macro.exe must be inside a folder so it can save settings/logs properly.

title: Macro Keeps Rejoining Roblox
solution:
ü§ñ Macro Issue ‚Äî Rejoining loop / unstable capture
  • Set Display Scale to 100%
  • Set Roblox language to English
  • Disable Auto-HDR if supported
  • Set Roblox text size to zero
  • Disable custom fonts / Bloxstrap settings
  • Go to Settings ‚Üí Macro ‚Üí Capture
  • Change Capture Mode to Legacy Monitor
  • Restart the macro
  • Place macro window at bottom-right of the screen

title: Macro Moving in Circles / Half Steps
solution:
ü§ñ Macro Issue ‚Äî Stuttering or circular movement

  • Turn off Performance Stats
Macro Settings

  • Disable speed buffs
  • Set hive detection to Detect
  • If FPS is low (17‚Äì40), press Shift + F5
  • Set alignment level to High
